垿字的基本解释

垿
xù
古代天子、诸侯宴会放酒杯的土台。亦称“反坫”。

垿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xù］
［《集韻》象吕切，上語，邪。］
(1)反坫之异名。参见“反坫”。
(2)用于人名。山东莱阳有王垿，精书法，常为人写匾，时有“有腔皆谭（谭鑫培），无匾不垿”之语。

垿字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　垿； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页229第15
【集韻】象呂切。同序。【博雅】反坫謂之垿。

垿字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
垿字的起名意思

反坫之异名，多用于人名。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
xù
An earthen platform where wine glasses were placed at the banquet of the emperor and princes in ancient times. Also known as "anti-坫".
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xù］
["Ji Yun" resembles Lu Qi, Shangyu, evil. ]
(1) The synonymous name of Anti-Liu. See "anti-坫".
(2) Used for names. In Laiyang, Shandong, there is Wang Din, who is skilled in calligraphy, and often writes plaques for others. Sometimes there is the saying "There is no plaque but no plaque".
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　垿; Kangxi strokes: 10; page number: page 229 to 15
【Ji Yun】Like Lv Che. The same sequence. [Bo Ya] Anti-Liu is called Zhi Nian.
Yin

Name meaning
The synonymous name of anti-坫 is mostly used for personal names.
xù
